message.content:
cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.LG, cs.NE 

The paper discusses the problem of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and proposes a system-theoretic and engineering-based research approach to tackle it. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also emphasizes the need for a conceptual leap and identifies cross-fertilization opportunities between systems disciplines and AI research, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.SE (Software Engineering). Additionally, the paper discusses the existing mainstream AI and systems foundations, which could place it in cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
